channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped mattress, 7th August
item.description:
Double mattress dumped in lane just off Bamfurlong Lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane

item.title: PROW completely obstructed, 7th August
item.description:
Please could this be investigated as recently advertised for sale declaring the PROW was void.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elm Garden Drive, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees, pavement parking, and more., 6th August
item.description:
The branches from the side of the trees are blocking the vision for oncoming traffic, plus the broken branches and leaves are covering the drain causing a large pool of water, and cars parking on the pavement outside Badhams chemist totally blocking the pavement used by people in mobility transport and ladies with prams, many times I have to clear up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Pittville Crescent, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large cracks several inches deep and wide., 6th August
item.description:
Cracks wide enough to cause trip hazard, turned ankle, trap wheel from push chair. Very dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary Traffic lights not phased properly, 6th August
item.description:
Hi the temporary traffic lights on the Evesham Rd, Cheltenham roadworks are not phased correctly. This is between the Racecourse roundabout and Pittville Park. The lights are not changing to green for long enough each way and the gap in between light changes is not long enough either. This is causing large tailbacks. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Evesham Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Public footpath heavily overgrown trees & bushes obstructing right of way, 6th August
item.description:
Public footpath from top of Harp Hill to Oakley Farm path. My house is next to the path. Address 64 Wessex Drive, Cheltenham, GL52 5AU.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill Footpath, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path/Way doesn't match map problem, 6th August
item.description:
Definitive alignment through thick woodland. Established waymarked route via stile (photo 1) & clearing to SW
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 6th August
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference due to tree roots 5000x1200x25mm tarmac patch required over tree roots slight ramp stats may be required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 6th August
item.description:
Definitive alignment overgrown & across sheepwire fence, corrugated panel, & fixed old wooden gate. Alternative route via stile nearby to NE & around farm buildings. Established stile, & signposted from road (photo 2)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path/Way doesn't match map problem, 6th August
item.description:
